tests.title: should return welcome message with endpoints
tests.fullTitle: testing server testing the API should return welcome message with endpoints

tests.title: should return subscribers
tests.fullTitle: testing server testing the API should return subscribers
tests.code:
const res = await chai.request(app).get('/subscribers')
            
            chai.expect(res.status).to.equal(200)
            chai.expect(res.body.subscribers[0].name).to.equal("Jeread Krus")
            chai.expect(res.body.subscribers[0].subscribedChannel).to.equal("CNET")
            chai.expect(res.body.subscribers[1].name).to.equal("John Doe")
            chai.expect(res.body.subscribers[1].subscribedChannel).to.equal("freeCodeCamp.org")
            chai.expect(res.body.subscribers[2].name).to.equal("Lucifer")
            chai.expect(res.body.subscribers[2].subscribedChannel).to.equal("Sentex")

tests.title: should return subscribers with names
tests.fullTitle: testing server testing the API should return subscribers with names

tests.title: should return subscribers with id
tests.fullTitle: testing server testing the API should return subscribers with id
tests.code:
const res = await chai.request(app).get(`/subscribers/${sampleDoc._id}`)
chai.expect(res.status).to.equal(200)
chai.expect(res.body.name).to.equal('John Doe')
chai.expect(res.body.subscribedChannel).to.equal('freeCodeCamp.org')

tests.title: Should return status 400 and 'Invalid subscriber ID.' error message if id is not a valid hexadecimal
tests.fullTitle: testing server testing the API Should return status 400 and 'Invalid subscriber ID.' error message if id is not a valid hexadecimal

tests.title: Should return status 400 and 'Subscriber not found.' if id was a valid hexadecimal but not present in the collection
